attributes.action: Consider those who pay separate charges for digital/cable.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and a TV licence can amount to over £600 per annum to sit at home and have the priviledge of watching TV.  It was the government that are enforcing the digital switchover, costing people more in buying new TV sets, this is nonsense, stop ripping us off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
